title: The Future of Artificial Intelligence
description: A deep dive into the next generation of AI, exploring advancements in neural networks and their potential impact on society.

title: Modern JavaScript Frameworks in 2026
description: An overview and comparison of the latest JavaScript frameworks, with live-coding examples and performance benchmarks.

title: Quantum Computing: From Theory to Reality
description: This talk demystifies quantum computing, explaining the fundamental principles and showcasing the first real-world applications.

title: Cybersecurity in a Post-Quantum World
description: As quantum computers emerge, what are the new threats to our digital infrastructure, and how can we prepare our defenses?

title: The Ethics of Code: A Developer's Guide
description: A discussion on the ethical responsibilities of software developers, from data privacy to algorithmic bias.

title: Building Scalable Systems with Microservices
description: Learn the patterns and practices for designing, deploying, and maintaining a scalable and resilient microservices architecture.
